name: Keep ItAlive
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 46.

You play as a mage using 4 elementary spells to protect and bring the last spark of Mana to the world's altar.

Fire burn foes

Air push everything away

Earth build irremovable walls

Water protect from every danger

Use those spells cleverly to pass all 5 levels and save the World.

I ran out of time, so ther's no music, sound and no preview for Earth and Air spells :/

But i'm still proud of me :D
